packageName: Hubitat → Xbar App for the Apple  macOS™ Menubar
author: Kurt Sanders
releaseNotes: After this upgrade, you must manually upgrade the Xbar plugin 'Hubitat_XBar.5m.py' to this same 1.0.2 release.\nFollow the install instructions in the documentation.\nThis release fixes several display bugs, HSM, standardizes default font sizes, reduces log view messages, verifies release numbers of python and groovy scripts to be the same and outputs a message to upgrade if different.
